about_the_game:
Story

It is Valentine's Day, and you are about to celebrate this joyous occasion with your boyfriend on your spaceship. Just as things are starting to heat up, the warning alarm sounds and the spaceship starts plummeting down towards an unknown planet. The ship crash lands, and you barely make it out alive. When you regain your consciousness, you notice that your boyfriend is missing. You summon your strength, and set off on a dangerous quest to find him.

Features

Love Is In The Space is a 2D Pixel Platform game with a romantic tale about love and heartbreak.


  • The game contains 25 beautiful and challenging levels - Search for your boyfriend through open fields, abandoned space stations and dark caves.
  • An experience, with a twist - Who said tales always end with happily ever after?
  • Easy to use controls - Play the game using WASD or the arrow keys.
  • Subtitles - For those who are having a hard time understanding the alien language.
